flex-col gap-5"},w1={key:0,class:"mt-6"},A1={__name:"BillingDetails",emits:["success"],setup(u,{emit:p}){const c=p,s=o(null),C=Q({billing_name:"",address:"",city:"",state:"",postal_code:"",country:"",gstin:""});M({url:"frappe.integrations.frappe_providers.frappecloud_billing.api",params:{method:"billing.get_information"},auto:!0,onSuccess:a=>{Object.assign(C,{address:a.address_line1,city:a.city,state:a.state,postal_code:a.pincode,country:a.country,gstin:a.gstin=="Not Applicable"?"":a.gstin,billing_name:a.billing_name})}});const i=o("");function v(){if(!C.billing_name){i.value="Billing Name is required";return}s.value.updateBillingInformation.submit()}return(a,m)=>(l(),d(X,null,[r("div",k1,[y(e(P),{modelValue:C.billing_name,"onUpdate:modelValue":m[0]||(m[0]=n=>C.billing_name=n),type:"text",name:"billing_name",label:"Billing Name",required:!0},null,8,["modelValue"]),y(O,{ref_key:"addressFormRef",ref:s,modelValue:C,"onUpdate:modelValue":m[1]||(m[1]=n=>C=n),onSuccess:m[2]||(m[2]=()=>c("success"))},null,8,["modelValue"]),y(e(H),{class:"mt-2",message:i.value},null,8,["message"])]),s.value?(l(),d("div",w1,[y(e(k),{class:"w-full",variant:"solid",label:"Update billing details",loading:s.value.updateBillingInformation.loading,onClick:v},null,8,["loading"])])):g("",!0)],64))}};export{z1 as _,M1 as a,A1 as b};
//# sourceMappingURL=BillingDetails-71e8e074.js.map
